pages.privacy-policy: HydroGleam - Privacy Policy HydroGleam HOME ABOUT US Services Contact MAKE CONTACT Privacy Policy HydroGleam is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and disclose your personal information when you use our website. Information We Collect Information you provide voluntarily: This may include your name, email address, shipping address, and billing information when you place an order, subscribe to our newsletter, or contact us. Information collected automatically: When you visit our website, we may collect information about your device, browsing activity, and IP address. This information is typically gathered through cookies and similar technologies. How We Use Your Information To fulfill your orders and requests. To send you promotional emails (with your consent). To improve our website and marketing efforts. To analyze trends and user behavior. Disclosure of Your Information We may share your information with third-party service providers who help us operate our website and fulfill your orders. We will only share your information with companies that have agreed to comply with our privacy standards. Your Choices You can opt-out of receiving promotional emails by clicking the unsubscribe link at the bottom of our emails. You can manage your cookie preferences through your web browser settings. Data Security We take reasonable steps to protect your information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no website is 100% secure. Changes to this Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will post any changes on our website. By using our website, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy. The HydroGleam website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline.
